attributes.action: Require that all new buildings and those undergoing refurbishment must install at least one additional forms of power supply.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Any new building, including homes, offices, hotels etc must have at least one additional form of power gerneration in order to supply electricity to the building.

This form of generation could be solar power, wind generation or any other form which would reduce the need for taking power from the National Grid.
